title: E-Learning Utilization Strategies for Business Education Content Delivery

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic business terminology and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening the ability to utilize online libraries and curricula in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain effective utilization strategies for online library resources through PBL tasks based on real business scenarios.
Learners can evaluate core elements of business content delivery (structure, delivery effectiveness, engagement) using mobile-accessible online curricula.
Learners can produce project outcomes that integrate and apply business educational materials using mobile devices, even in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
